dt-option.summary: Enable or disable filtering on the data in this column
dt-option.description: Using this parameter, you can defined if DataTables should include this column in the filterable data in the table. You may want use this option to display filtering on generated columns such as 'Edit' and 'Delete' buttons for example.
dt-option.name: columns.searchable

Disable filtering on the first column with `dt-init columns`
